objects.text:
• Classic retro-style design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor
• Fast autofocus system
• Compact design for travel

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Simple
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-style design with modern functionality
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with real-time preview
• Fast autofocus system for capturing decisive moments
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings adjustment
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Film simulation modes to achieve classic Fujifilm looks

banner_details:
This banner showcases a high-end camera product with a modern, tech-forward aesthetic. The layout is divided into quadrants using a clean grid system, giving it a structured and professional feel. The top-left corner contains a bold, futuristic title (`heading`) and model name (`subheading`), followed by a red secondary tagline (`tagline`). Below that is a softer, supportive tagline (`description`), enhancing the message of simplicity and professionalism.

The right side features a realistic product image (`product_image`) that dominates visual attention. The bottom quadrant includes a strong features list (`features`) and pricing information (`price`) to inform and entice potential buyers. A bold red call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with `cta` text draws user interaction. Finally, a secondary tagline (`tagline_2`) in the lower-right corner reinforces the brand promise.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#101010`
- Charcoal Gray: `#2A2A2A`
- Signal Red: `#D32F2F`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Gray Text: `#CCCCCC`
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera using a sleek and professional color palette dominated by deep matte black (#1A1A1A) and accents of metallic gray (#4D4D4D). Silver-white highlights (#F2F2F2) on dials and branding provide sharp contrast and visual clarity while emphasizing the product's precision engineering. Subtle hints of crimson red (#CC3333) and amber-orange (#FF9933) on lens markers add sophistication and guide visual focus. The lens glass reflects a gradient of greenish-yellow (#A2C532) and cool teal (#30A9A1), introducing vivid contrast against the monochrome body. The overall harmony of these colors communicates elegance, durability, and high performance—ideal for a minimal, impactful advertisement banner.
